articles.description:
Re The cool thing is even while it's vesting $vPSP holders will be earning a share of Paraswaps protocol revenue in $ETH
And you can boost your share:
- by swapping
- by referring other users 
- submitting limit orders 
It's a neat way to align these users with Paraswaps success.
